text: Amintore Fanfani (; 6 February 1908 - 20 November 1999) was an Italian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Italy for five separate times. He was one of the best-known Italian politicians after the Second World War. He was a historical figure of the left-wing section of the Christian Democracy party. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Tuscany Category:Presidents of the Italian Senate
title: Amintore Fanfani
